name: Athelinde's Habitica Style
description: My personal mash-up and tweaking of styles to my personal taste. Smaller header, more tasks visible, filter and search bar still available, and group still showing. Task notes and check-lists hidden till hover. Drawers collapsed till hover. ** Work in Progress **
additional_info:
My personal mash-up and tweaking of "Shrink Your Habitica Tasks" By Adilendian & mareinna, "Habitica Compact Light Header" & "Habitica Collapse Drawers until hover" by sonnet73, "Habitica Smaller Header" by ensorceled. Of some I took actual parts of their styles, others provided inspiration. Each of these styles had something I liked and something I didn't, so here is mine.
** Work in Progress **
- First public release
